entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Smith
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Smith Airport 8:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -24.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -27.2°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
